description:
Microtonal zither twangs, off-world vocals and k-hole sonic wonders characterise Martyna Basta's brilliant second album, a crepuscular muddle of improvisations and granular invocations.

Martyna Basta's 'Making Eye Contact With Solitude'Â took us by surprise, demolishing the borders between electro-acoustic experimentation, wyrd folk and ambient music by infusing scholarly expertise with raw, unbounded passion. description:

              Symposium Musicum
            
              (Mappa Editions)
label: Mappa Editions
description:
A study of Slovakia's Romani community, Symposium Musicum is a bold collage of field recordings, interviews and deconstructed sound design that should appeal to anyone into Discrepant, Sublime Frequencies or Ash International.

'Symposium Musicum' is an almost inscrutable proposition: conceptually dense and sonically jagged material that not only requires attention but multiple listens to unspool its tangled mass of ideas and themes. Masterminded by Elia Moretti and Marika... more
